ABSmodJ.Behaviour

Uses of Behaviour in ABSmodJ
 

Subclasses of Behaviour in ABSmodJ
 class Action
          This class is the super class to the two classes: ConditionalAction and ScheduledAction.
 class Activity
          Extend this class to implement activity constructs.
 class ActivitySuper
          Super class to all variations of activity classes: Activity, TrigActivity, ExtActivity, ExtTrigActivity.
 class ConditionalAction
          Extend this class to implement conditional action constructs.
 class ExtActivity
          Extend this class to implement extended activity constructs.
 class ExtTrigActivity
          Extend this class to implement extended triggered activity constructs.
 class ScheduledAction
          Extend this class to implement scheduled action constructs.
 class TrigActivity
          Extend this class to implement triggered activity constructs.
 

Fields in ABSmodJ declared as Behaviour
 Behaviour SBNotice.behaviourInstance
          The reference to the scheduled Behaviour instance.
 

Methods in ABSmodJ with parameters of type Behaviour

          Schedule a behaviour object on the SBL.
abstract  void AOSimulationModel.testPreconditions(Behaviour beh)
          Implement this method to test preconditions and schedule Actions/Activities.
 SBNotice AOSimulationModel.unscheduleBehaviour(Behaviour beh)

Constructors in ABSmodJ with parameters of type Behaviour
